select
distinct
from hbip_pub_user
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from hbip_pub_user
order by ${orderByClause}

select YongHuID, YongHuMing, XingMing, YouXiang, LianXiDianHua, LianXiDiZhi, TouXiangURL, YongHuLeiBie,HeiMingDanBiaoJi, ZhuangTai, ShiFouFuWuJiGou, DianPuMingCheng,FuWuJiGouID,JiaMengZhuangTai,ZhuangTai from hbip_pub_user where YongHuMing=#{logName} or YouXiang=#{logName} or LianXiDianHua=#{logName} and ShiFouYiShanChu=0 and MiMa=#{pwd}

select YongHuID, YongHuMing, TouXiangURL,XingBie,XingMing,SuoZaiShengFen,YongHuLeiBie, ZhengJianHao, SuoZaiChengShi, YouXiang,LianXiDianHua,DianPuMingCheng,GuanZhuShu,FenSiShu,ZhuangTai,LianXiRenXingMing,ZuZhiLeiXing, ZhuCeShiJian, DianPuJianJie, DianPuTuBiao,DuanXingYanZheng,DianPuQQ from hbip_pub_user where YongHuID=#{userId}
